title: Welcome to conda.org!
description:
Welcome to our new website! In this article, we talk about why we built
this website and how we would like to see be used going forward.

title: Conda survey results
description:
In late 2022, Anaconda surveyed the community. This post reviews what we
learned from that survey and how it is impacting the future directions of conda.

title: Conda Community Chat is now on Element/Matrix
description: We are pleased to announce that the conda community has migrated our chat rooms to the Matrix/Element platform.

title: Get conda news on the conda Announce mailing list
description:
Conda Announce is the new the mailing list for announcements and news
relevant to the conda ecosystem and community.

title: Conda-build 3.23 Released
description:
The newest version of conda-build is now available. Find out exactly
what's changed and how to upgrade.
